> > 调试2.6.5版本的代码发现是通过“accesslog”（通过变量Constants.ACCESS_LOG_KEY）的配置项获取对应的值。

> 在 2.7.3 中 AccessLogFilter 中的 ACCESS_LOG_KEY 定义和 org.apache.dubbo.rpc.Constants.ACCESS_LOG_KEY 存在重复， 导致了以上问题。我发现在 2.7.4.1 中被修复了

> 客户端收到的网络地址是正确的么？看起来是建立链接失败了。

怎麽解決?其他同事也遇到這個問題了,2.6版本沒問題.
已经解决了,原因是server配置必须使用jetty的才能正常使用,server使用servlet则无法连接.

再有,使用jetty模式.必须要引入eclipse的jetty的包,这个缺省不会带进来.

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.eclipse.jetty</groupId>
            <artifactId>jetty-servlet</artifactId>
        </dependency>
看它的测试用例就知道了呀

```java
dubbo.protocols.dubbo.name=dubbo
dubbo.protocols.dubbo.port=20880

dubbo.protocols.hessian.name=hessian
dubbo.protocols.hessian.port=20881
```

具体配置信息在*org.apache.dubbo.config.spring.context.annotation.DubboConfigConfiguration*这个类

provider目前看是没有这种配置的，对于consumer来说，你注册的两种协议是就是两个提供者，默认的RandomLoadBalance是会随机选择的，所以，你应该是从consumer层去规定这次该使用哪种协议

你这是qos端口吧😄
你需要直接telnet dubbo提供服务的端口   dubbo.protocol.port

你应该telnent你的dubbo.protocol.port
而不是dubbo.application.qos-port

> 你zk的ip地址没配对吧？

2.7.3版本和2.7.4.1版本的zookeeper配置不一样？我翻翻示例，这是我得配置
```
dubbo:
  scan:
    base-packages: ${project.package}
  application:
    id: ${project.name}
    name: ${project.name}
  protocol:
    id: dubbo
    name: dubbo
    port: xxxx
    status: server
  registry:
    id: xxx-registry
    address: zookeeper://IP:port
  provider:
    filter: DubboContextFilter
```

@chickenlj 我们在尝试落地对接中，对于Apollo用于配置中心，仍存在一些疑惑
1. namespace属性对应Apollo的namespace用于配置服务治理信息的，但和group、config-file、app-config-file的使用搭配缺乏明确的指导。
2. 随着企业内服务数的增加（比如1万以上服务），namespace下的key-value数量是：服务数✖️2+节点数✖️4（1条提供者{application.name}、1条消费者{application.name}、1条{service:version:group}、1条消费者{application.name}.condition-router、1条{service:version:group}.condition-router、1条消费者{application.name}.tag-router），这个对Apollo整体性能容量、网络压力影响有多大？
3. namespace下节点级的{application.name}.configurators和服务级的{service:version:group}.configurators的边界模糊。某些服务级别配置2个key下都能用。
4. namespace中的key-value的key和value中yaml内的key存在意义冲突。

> > > Try changing timeout field of default RegistryConfig to 5000
> > 
> > 
> > I set it and found that it still didn't work
> 
> Is it configured like this? address: zookeeper://ip:port?timeout=5000

yes, I tried it ,but error still happened,when I set address: zookeeper://127.0.0.1:port without timeout or  dubbo version set 2.7.3,  the project running success .

just now, I set  address: zookeeper://ip:port?timeout=15000,and project running success, thank you for help me,
update merge
There're no file changes in this PR.
是的，thanks

>  1. namespace属性对应Apollo的namespace用于配置服务治理信息的，但和group、config-file、app-config-file的使用搭配缺乏明确的指导。

对于 Apollo 的场景来说，`config-file、app-config-file` 并没有实际意义，只关注 `namespace group` 即可。推荐用法：`<dubbo namespace="governance" group ="dubbo"/>`

> 2. 随着企业内服务数的增加（比如1万以上服务），namespace下的key-value数量是：服务数✖️2+节点数✖️4（1条提供者{application.name}、1条消费者{application.name}、1条{service:version:group}、1条消费者{application.name}.condition-router、1条{service:version:group}.condition-router、1条消费者{application.name}.tag-router），这个对Apollo整体性能容量、网络压力影响有多大？

因为通常需要配置规则的 service 还是少数的，并且 application 级别配置的引入一方面原因也是为了减少配置维护量。所以我认为实际和理论数据量还是会有些差异。

> 3. namespace下节点级的{application.name}.configurators和服务级的{service:version:group}.configurators的边界模糊。某些服务级别配置2个key下都能用。

这个问题能否具体再描述一下？

> 4. namespace中的key-value的key和value中yaml内的key存在意义冲突。

能否举个例子。因为按照设计，`value中yaml内的key` 是不暴露到用户侧的，由 Dubbo-Admin 来自动填充，屏蔽掉 `key-value的key` 和 `value中yaml内的key`  的转换和差异。

@RojerAlone 
sorry for late reply. Master branch is not stable at this moment, that's why PR is delay. but for this one, it's for javadoc document, it's ok to ignore CI result.

Just one question

what do you mean by ```and don't greater than ExchangeCodes.SERIALIZATION_MASK (31)```?
are you referring to https://github.com/apache/dubbo/blob/master/dubbo-remoting/dubbo-remoting-api/src/main/java/org/apache/dubbo/remoting/exchange/codec/ExchangeCodec.java#L59

you mentioned `31` in here, could you give more description for this magic number ?

Provider must be sent first in most scenes.
multi-versions can  distinguish between different versions,But its premise is that the provider is able
http://dubbo.apache.org/zh-cn/docs/user/demos/multi-versions.html

@htynkn yes, the serialization module's javadoc can't reference other module which it does't import, so I don't use `@link` doc tag.
Your meaning is I should describe why it's 31?
yes , we didn't specified version ;so I think it's not recommended that  the entity class in the interface contains enum attribute , Maybe this will solve the problem.

> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/apache/dubbo/pull/5390?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [7797074...4c85f25](https://codecov.io/gh/apache/dubbo/pull/5390?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

so I think there is a typo it should be  ExchangeCodec not ExchangeCodes.

another question is why it can't greater than 31？ the reason for it may not include in javadoc if it's too long. just make sure it coming from correct  source

I had used a very big number, and some exceptions are throwed, then I read the code, found that the serialization ID is stored in the dubbo protocol response header, it would be used to find which serialization protocol to use, code is https://github.com/apache/dubbo/blob/master/dubbo-remoting/dubbo-remoting-api/src/main/java/org/apache/dubbo/remoting/exchange/codec/ExchangeCodec.java#L138.

In this line, dubbo use and function with SERIALIZATION_MASK and serialization tag, the root reason is dubbo use 5 bits to record serializtion id in protocol header, official document is https://dubbo.apache.org/zh-cn/blog/dubbo-protocol.html

So, if the developer use a big number bigger than SERIALIZATION_MASK, unexpected things would happened (can't find serialization protocol or use incorrect protocol to deserialize response etc.)

> > 3. namespace下节点级的{application.name}.configurators和服务级的{service:version:group}.configurators的边界模糊。某些服务级别配置2个key下都能用。
> 
> 这个问题能否具体再描述一下？

比如
```
configVersion: v.27
scope: service
key: org.apache.dubbo.demo.DemoService
configs:
  - parameters:
    weight: 500
    side: consumer
```
这条配置，既可以写在key=org.apache.dubbo.demo.DemoService::.configurators下，也可以写在key=demo-consumer.configurators下。因为在RegistryDirectory.overrideWithConfigurator()中都处理了。

> > 1. namespace属性对应Apollo的namespace用于配置服务治理信息的，但和group、config-file、app-config-file的使用搭配缺乏明确的指导。
> 
> 对于 Apollo 的场景来说，`config-file、app-config-file` 并没有实际意义，只关注 `namespace group` 即可。推荐用法：`<dubbo namespace="governance" group ="dubbo"/>`

从AbstractInterfaceConfig.prepareEnviroment的设计看，我理解整体上其实需要的是3份配置文件（先不管代码逻辑）
1. app级别（节点级别），对应Environment.appExternalConfigs，应该读取app-config-file/config-file参数值，默认值=application
2. dubbo级别（组件级别），对应Environment.externalConfigs，应该读取group参数值，默认值=dubbo
3. 治理规则级别，对应各个Router和override监听，目前读取namespace参数值，默认值=governance
我不知道这样理解是否正确？至少这样调理可以更清晰。同时参数名做调整也更好了：
```
<dubbo:config-center app-config-file="application" group="dubbo" rules="governance">
```

那么再进一步归纳，需要的其实是2类配置
1. 启动时加载的参数，key=value(string)，存储到Environment，可以对应多个Apollo上的namespace。
2. 规则参数，key=value(yaml)，对应Apollo上另外一个namespace。

是不是就简化为：
```
<dubbo:config-center configs="application; dubbo;" rules="governance">
```

和 zkclient 没有关联

Hi, Lavaong:
Here is a temporary resolution:
find this file:   dubbo-dependencies-bom/pom.xml

change the version of tag alibaba_spring_context_support_version to 1.0.5, then you will build success.

<alibaba_spring_context_support_version>1.0.4-SNAPSHOT</alibaba_spring_context_support_version>

<alibaba_spring_context_support_version>1.0.5</alibaba_spring_context_support_version>
